word_mean: 复原，恢复，康复：受伤或患病后恢复正常的形态和功能
伤病患者在最可能短的时间恢复有收益的工作或恢复到自我满足的程度
疾病痊愈，完全恢复健康，为疾病转归的最佳结局。
根据中医理论，运用药物和非药物方法，恢复残疾者的机体结构、功能和心理的传统医学方法。

sentence.Network_en: He's booked himself into a rehabilitation clinic.
sentence.Network_cn: 他自己联系了一家康复诊所.

sentence.Network_en: Money will be directed primarily towards the maintenance and rehabilitation of schools, clinics and machinery.
sentence.Network_cn: 资金将主要用于学校、诊所和机器设备的维护和修缮。

sentence.Network_en: Hubbard was well known for his work in the field of drug rehabilitation.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈伯德因在戒毒康复领域所做的工作而为人所熟知。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1、康复（rehabilitation） 分成完全康复与不完全康复两种。完全康复主要是指疾病时所发生的损伤性变化完全消失，机体的自稳调节恢复.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... recite v. 背诵，朗诵 rehabilitation n. 恢复，复原 saliva n. 口水，唾液.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... rehabilitant 康复中的病残者 rehabilitation 修复 rehabilitative 使复原的.
伤残复健（Rehabilitation）是针对目标与时间有限的一段过程，旨在使有缺陷的人在生理、心理和（或）社会功能上都能达到一种最 …

康复科-... ... 心理疗法 Psychological therapy 康复工程 Rehabilitation engineering 职业康复 Vocational rehabilitation.
.../a>康复心理学的研究内容康复心理学的研究方法3图书信息书样内容简介作者简介图书目录1概述定义康复心理学(rehabilitation psychology)，运用心理学的理论和技术研究揭示康复中的心理活动、心理现象及规律的学科。康复心理学的目的是解决康复对象的一系列心理障碍，帮助他们接受并逐渐适应残疾现实，挖掘他们的潜能，重新回归社会。<br.
康复医学科的治疗技术 ... 作业治疗( occupational therapy，OT) 康复护理( rehabilitation nursing) 社会服务( social service).

entry.tran: 使康复;使戒毒(或戒酒);改造(罪犯)
entry.def: To rehabilitate someone who has been ill or in prison means to help them to live a normal life again. To rehabilitate someone who has a drug or alcohol problem means to help them stop using drugs or alcohol.

example.ex: Considerable efforts have been made to rehabilitate patients who have suffered in this way.
example.tran: 为帮助遭受这种病痛折磨的病人康复付出了巨大努力。

entry.tran: 使恢复名誉;给…平反昭雪
entry.def: If someone is rehabilitated, they begin to be considered acceptable again after a period during which they have been rejected or severely criticized.

example.ex: Ten years later, Dreyfus was rehabilitated...
example.tran: 10年之后，德雷福斯的冤情得以昭雪。

example.ex: His candidacy has divided the party; while most have scorned him, others have sought to rehabilitate him.
example.tran: 他的候选资格使该党出现分化;其中大多数人都嘲弄他，而另外一些人则想办法为他恢复名誉。

entry.tran: 复原，修葺，整修，修复(建筑物或某区域)
entry.def: To rehabilitate a building or an area means to improve its condition so that it can be used again.

example.tran: 对低收入者的住房进行整修的项目

means.word_mean: 1. the restoration of someone to a useful place in society
2. the conversion of wasteland into land suitable for use of habitation or cultivation
3. vindication of a person's character and the re-establishment of that person's reputation
4. the treatment of physical disabilities by massage and electrotherapy and exercises
